song_name: All I Want For X-Mas is my PSP
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, All I Want For X-Mas is my PSP has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
All I Want For X-Mas is my PSP is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
